idprovider-desc: A MediaWiki service extension that provides (unique) IDs in several ways
idp-apiparam-skipuniquetest: Checks that the ID does not correspond to an already existing wikipage
idp-apiparam-prefix: Prefix/namespace. In case of increments, each prefix gets it's own increment state.
idp-random-apiparam-type: Choose a random ID generation algorithm
idp-increment-apiparam-start: Start/increase increment with/to this minimum value
idp-increment-apiparam-padding: Minimum length of the generated increment number. Fills it with leading zeros. E.g. padding=5 results in 00001
